title: Plantera Seedling
summaries: The Plantera Seedling is a Master Mode-exclusive pet dropped by Plantera with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. Upon being used or equipped, it summons a Plantera Seedling pet.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a newly sprouted Plantera
'Get to the root of the problem.'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
